pages.title: Autonomous Crafting
pages.text: The $(bold)craft_item$() tool is fully autonomous. It handles the entire chain from nothing:$(br2)$(li)Checks companion inventory + nearby chests$(li)Auto-crafts all intermediate items$(li)Auto-gathers missing raw materials$(li)Auto-crafts required tools first$(li)Auto-hunts mobs for drops (leather, string)$(li)Auto-smelts ores at a furnace$(br2)Example: $(thing)"Craft an iron pickaxe"$() from nothing — chop trees → craft planks → craft sticks → craft wood pick → gather stone → craft stone pick → mine iron → smelt → craft iron pickaxe.

pages.title: Tool Prerequisites
pages.text: The crafting system auto-detects when tools are needed:$(br2)$(li)Need to mine stone? Crafts a wooden pickaxe first$(li)Need to mine iron? Crafts wooden → stone pickaxe first$(li)Need to mine diamond? Crafts the whole pickaxe chain$(br2)It checks both $(bold)MINE$() steps (ores) and $(bold)GATHER$() steps (cobblestone, stone) for tool requirements.$(br2)The companion also fetches materials from nearby $(#55FF55)STORAGE$() chests before gathering from the world.

pages.title: Smelting
pages.text: The $(bold)smelt_items$() tool handles furnace automation:$(br2)$(li)Finds a nearby furnace (or auto-crafts + places one)$(li)Inserts items and fuel$(li)Waits for smelting to complete$(li)Collects the output$(li)Auto-gathers fuel (chops trees) if needed$(br2)Smelting is also built into the crafting chain — if a recipe needs ingots, the companion will smelt raw ore automatically.$(br2)Say $(thing)"Smelt my raw iron"$() or just $(thing)"Make iron ingots"$().
